availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas J. Martin and Elizabeth Martin. Brother of Eliza Martin, James A. Martin, John T. Martin, Maria Martin, and Amanda Martin. Married Martha Green Martin in Spencer County on August 28, 1862. Farmer in Spencer County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District No. 1, p. 75; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District 2, p. 4; "Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954," database with images, FamilySearch https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/3:1:3QSQ-G937-P36B?cc=1804888&wc=QD3Q-4BN%3A1589735541 (accessed June 30, 2016).
